name: quick-feet

effect.sword_shield: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
effect.legends_arceus: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

short_effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
